name: Costanza!
description:
It's been almost forty years since The Seinfeld made it's mark on television history. With over 30 episodes, it was one of the longest running tv shows never to enter syndication. Most of my personal experience with the show came from a bootleg recording my grandfather made by setting up a camcorder and pointing it at his television.

My favorite episode was always The Frogger.

It's a shame so few people have seen this show. I've created this game to draw attention to the fact that The Seinfeld has never been released on DVD.

This is not promotional advertising.
